website_summaries.verdict: While the Organic Valley chocolate shake is a good meal replacement choice, we recommend it more for post-workout recovery.
cons: Higher carb content, not ideal for diabetics
Sugar content may be too high for some users

customer_reviews.title: Really disappointed in new product!  Please bring old formulation back!!
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed that i ordered the old formula but was sent the new. Relied on the old formula for years! New formula has LESS protein and fewer calories! If I wanted a diet shake, there are a million choices. I relied on this because it WASN’T a diet shake. Please bring the old formula back.
customer_reviews.author: Eric I.

customer_reviews.title: New formula w/ Stevia. Gross..
customer_reviews.text: Changed formula. Adding Stevia was a mistake. It’s disgusting now with an awful aftertaste.
customer_reviews.author: Carey Bumgardner

customer_reviews.title: Best protein product on the market!  NO FAKE SUGARS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: So glad I chose this product!!! The taste is great The Protein is exactly what I needed. I will return for more. I am allergic to all fake sugars, it is poison to me. To find a healthy alternative protein source with out Stevia or Splenda was my goal. This is it, I am hooked for life
customer_reviews.author: DiHealey

customer_reviews.title: Formula was changed - not good.
customer_reviews.text: The formula was changed; not the same product anymore. Pure cane sugar was changed to stevia, calorie count went down as well as protein count.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen L.

customer_reviews.title: It has stevia, not listed on ingredients description
customer_reviews.text: The description does not say it has stevia in the ingredients. When I received it and read the box it does have it! I cant stand the taste of it. Stevia kills every drink! Where is there a protein drink that has no stevia? Pleas help
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Old formula 5 stars, new formula 0
customer_reviews.text: I loved the old formula with 26g of protein, real sugar and no junk fillers. New formula has less protein and lower quality ingredients. Cancelling my subscription until they come to their senses and bring back the original. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Dog Mom

customer_reviews.title: Real all recent reviews starting 9/2016!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is not ok!!! All of us in my household have been using Fuel for several years! The best protein drink on the market. We used to buy 3 12 packs a month!! No more!!!! This new formula is TERRIBLE!!! Please please please bring back the old formula!!! I am beyond sorry to say that Organic Valley has just lost a very loyal customer! Taking out the organic sugar and replacing it with stevia was a very poor decision on the part of Organic Valley!!
customer_reviews.author: Suzy G

customer_reviews.title: It tastes like Vanilla Ice Cream.
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this shake is delicious! I thought that it was a meal replacement shake but it’s really a protein shake. To me it tastes like your drinking melted vanilla soft serve ice cream. It’s smooth and doesn’t leave an after taste. I enjoy it best cold. Don’t be afraid to blend a banana, strawberries or peanut butter in it. It’s one of the best protein shakes I’ve ever had and is amazing straight from the bottle. I hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If it isn’t broke, DON’T fix it!
customer_reviews.text: WHY change the formula—and to this! Why aren’t the ingredients listed I wonder? Could it be because your “organic” drink now contains cancer causing stevia!?? And now with less protein....for the same price!! They took the drinks out of plastic bottles, only to add artificial sweeteners 🤦🏻‍♀️. The old formula was absolutely, deliciously, perfectly organic. I will NOT be buying Organic Valley Organic Fuel again.
customer_reviews.author: Integrity

customer_reviews.title: They taste great. A little pricey so this past week we ...
customer_reviews.text: We have been buying the vanilla and chocolate for months and have them every day. They taste great. A little pricey so this past week we tried a different brand that was organic and had all good ingredients at half the cost. Our first taste of the other brand was disappointing, it didn't taste at all like a shake in fact we didn't know what it tasted like, chalk maybe. So, even though it costs more, we are back to ordering Organic Valley because we were spoiled by the excellent taste plus knowing the ingredients were wholesome. This review applies to the chocolate flavor as well.
customer_reviews.author: Coolswede

customer_reviews.title: If Carbs are Ok then these are great, if not Go with Premier Protein Organic Shakes 1/5 the sugar
customer_reviews.text: I guess I should have looked at the nutrition label, I normally get Premier Protein Organic shakes, which have 10g Carbs, 5g Sugar, 3g Fiber so net carbs are 7g, and very tasty. I was surprised when I saw the Organic Valley Fuel had 27g Carbs, 26g sugar, 1g Fiber. So if you need the carbs this is the shake for you, if you are looking for less sugar than I would look at the Premier Protein "Organic" not their regular ones that have sucralose
customer_reviews.author: David P

customer_reviews.title: Not a great taste...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, it does not taste good - at all. My son said it tastes like a Sharpie.
customer_reviews.author: Bridgit Pelley

customer_reviews.title: Terrible taste compared to the old one
customer_reviews.text: They went and ruined a perfectly good product-at least make both and give people a choice. The fake sugar substitute just tastes terrible. Looking for a replacement for the kids.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisR

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Awesome! Has natural sugar. (Watch out for the new packaging has stevia)
customer_reviews.text: The current formulation tastes great. I have tried the chocolate and vanilla. Usually I like vanilla over chocolate but the one i tried was a bit grainy. So I went with Chocolate the second time I got it and I have to say it tastes great! Currently it has just plain old regular sugar which is just the way I like it. I saw there are some new 20g protein packaging that showed up on Amazon. These have Stevia...! Don't buy those unless you're ok with that. I don't like the taste of stevia so I'm not too excited to see that. I hope they keep the regular sugar ones coming.
customer_reviews.author: AnonymousReviewer

customer_reviews.title: New formula HORRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: Horrible NEW formulation. 0 stars. Go back to the original old formula without Stevia...pure cane sugar is a GOOD thing after a workout. Cancelled my subscription bc of this new formula junk.
customer_reviews.author: Hassan A. Riaz

customer_reviews.title: Not a strong flavor
customer_reviews.text: I underwent chemo and radiation and am underweight. It’s difficult to find products that help with weight gain. I was disappointed in these. They aren’t very favorable so I add vanilla extract to them. I switched to these because the other brand I bought changed their formula and now use Stevia. I was; however, able to gain a pound a week drinking them before they changed their formula. Protein shakes are so expensive and since I did not gain one pound adding these to my diet I will not continue to purchase them. It could be that I’ve leveled off and stuck at current weight, but was discouraged that these weren’t the answer I so desperately need.
customer_reviews.author: Lilly

customer_reviews.title: Not overly sweet, no artificial stuff, no stevia (unlike the powder)
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a few protein shakes, and this is my favorite because (1) it delivers a good amount of protein per shake (26g per shake for 260 calories is pretty good), (2) it has no artificial/unidentifiable ingredients, (3) it tastes good and is not overly sweet, and (4) it does not rely on stevia. Also, it does not have other additives of questionable benefit/harm (green tea extract and other additives). Probably because it lacks stevia, it does have sugar, but still gives 1g of protein per 10 calories, which is actually better amount of protein per calorie than other shakes out there.
customer_reviews.author: Bike Geek

customer_reviews.title: I did not get what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Organic Valley 26G protein shakes. Instead I got organic valley 20G Shake with 50% less sugar. This just is not what I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Garff

customer_reviews.title: The shake is good but the price is ridiculious
customer_reviews.text: The shake is good but the price is ridiculious. Costco sells a 24pk for $29.97. These are $39.99 for only 12. What a rip off
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Fitness Fuel In A Bottle
customer_reviews.text: 2015 Mistress Susan Secret Stuff Awards Winner for Best Protein Shake. I have tried many protein shakes in a bottle. None compare to this product for 3 main reasons. Having 26 grams is high since most drinks have less protein than that. It tastes very good, with no after taste. Also, it is organic. You cannot beat that! As a personal trainer and fitness nut, I drink this product to fuel my workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Mistress Susan TV

customer_reviews.title: The only shake where I choose Vanilla over Chocolate
customer_reviews.text: Off a recent lighting deal I picked up a case of Vanilla and these things are delicious! I'm always a chocolate man and I started on the Chocolate fuel out of necessity (road tripping and stopped for a workout) but will now stick to Vanilla. I treat these shakes akin to 'Slim Fast', acting as a quick meal supplement or protein source following a workout. My morning routine has turned into a Vanilla fuel, a banana, fish oil supplements, and I hit the road.
customer_reviews.author: Seth P.

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor and great for post workout
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a great tasting protein shake that I can have after my soccer games. I tried muscle milk in chocolate and it was...okay. I kept getting an after taste with every sip. I read the label and it looks like it was made with stevia. It did taste like an artificial sweetner. I read a review from someone that purchased the muscle milk and they recommended the Organic Valley product. So I gave it a try. WOW! It tasted like a cup of chocolate milk you drank when you were a kid...the nestle quik powdered form; not too chocolatey not too milky. I am super picky about stuff and I do demand quality. This is a winner!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Villegas

customer_reviews.title: Great Recovery
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome! I used to purchase core power religiously until they changed the formula to include artificial sweeteners. Organic Valley is my go to now!!
customer_reviews.author: Armando Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Great, overpriced, almost expired-when-received product
customer_reviews.text: Would be nice to know the expiration date when ordering. When they finally get around to shipping the order, its anyone’s guess on the shelf life. Based on that, I’d order only what can be consumed in a week.
customer_reviews.author: robk64

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced watery milk...
customer_reviews.text: What's with all these glowing reviews of this milk shake? This does not taste like milk.. more like water mixed with milk. Or very watery milk.... I could only have one sip! And the price? $3+ per bottle. Utterly ridiculous! Thank you, Amazon, for the refund.
customer_reviews.author: ATB

customer_reviews.title: BREAKFAST ON THE GO
customer_reviews.text: My quick start breakfast with 26 grams of protein at 4:00 am. Great taste and vitamins are easier to swallow. I have tried other protein drinks but some of their ingredients are not for me. Organic Valley is a bit more expensive than the other protein drinks but I believe, everything considered, worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Fraggle

customer_reviews.title: Tasty! -er
customer_reviews.text: I have a family member who is currently undergoing chemotherapy. He prefers this flavor over Glucerna and Ensure in order to get his nutrients (the others are overly sweet and can cause nausea for him). As a result, we mix Organic Fuel with the other dietary milkshakes to help ensure that he's getting all the nutrients he needs.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn Lam

customer_reviews.title: Watch out for subscribe and save price changes.
customer_reviews.text: Organic Valley makes a fine product with this protein shake. My issue was the shady pricing. I had this item on subscribe and save with no issues over the course of about two years. Then I noticed a charge on my billing that didn't match up with my budget and when I looked into it i found that the price on this item had increased by 145%. I did not receive any notifications of a price change. That's bad business Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: MarieGallo

customer_reviews.title: Great occasionally post-workout, Sadly fast expiration.
customer_reviews.text: Product review: perfect mix of natural and added sugar 1:1 with protein for post-exercise recovery, real sugar (THANK YOU for no stevia), is not too sweet, chocolate is tasty and satisfying, lactose-free. So glad I found at SoCal Ralphs then able to buy cheaper on Amazon. Thanks, Organic Valley! Issues: Amazon shipped my last order with an expiration date of 9 days after it was delivered - I only supplement workouts with this about 2x week so impossible to consume w/o being unhealthy about it. This is a 9-month shelf stable product, from my understanding, so no excuse for it expiring soon AND I don't want to drink so much highly pasteurized/processed food. )-:
customer_reviews.author: Terra E. Whitmeyer

customer_reviews.title: High in Sugar
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because I was curious about how it stacked up against other similar products I've tried. I value them for their ease of consumption. This particular product is really high in sugar. For around the same price, I can get a much healthier product that tastes even better. This one is simply a miss for me. I felt the flavor was way too sweet, and that it was basically a dessert in a bottle. Not a healthy meal.
customer_reviews.author: Rupert Pupkin

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper at Whole Foods
customer_reviews.text: My boy gymnast loves the flavor. I love the lack of chemicals. The only down side is that it's cheaper when bought locally.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Pricey
customer_reviews.text: One out of ONLY two brands of protein shakes me and my Grandad liked! This brand has the chocolate milk consistency but mildly chocolatey tasty. The other brand that we switched to is Evolve chocolate 11 oz card board bottle NOT the 12 ounce plastic bottle which seems to taste difference. Evolve has a more chocolatey taste but a little bit thinner consistency. Amazon's been out of stock so, I buy it at Target or Walgreens.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: pretty good
customer_reviews.text: This chocolate shake is a bit thicker and different than the Organic Valley vanilla protein shake. It is still pretty good, but has a bit more of that protein shake after taste. I do love that these are made from Organic Valley with great ingredients and low sugar! Definitely recommend if you are looking for protein shakes.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: I got mine 8 months expired.
customer_reviews.text: The product is good I’ve had it before. Unfortunately only after My son and I had a couple we realized that they were expired. We got ours on April 4th 2018 and the product expiring date is 19 August 2017. Check before you open.
customer_reviews.author: T. A.

customer_reviews.title: Tasty protein sgake
customer_reviews.text: My favorite protein shakes overall since they taste really nicely (like proper chocolate milk) instead of some powdered goo like other shakes. It also has 26g of protein per bottle, so one of my best nutritional sources of protein since I am a vegetarian and don’t take meat proteins typically. Love it , re ordered this on subscribe and save option every month as a result. I like both their chocolate and vanilla versions.
customer_reviews.author: RG123

customer_reviews.title: Try another brand
customer_reviews.text: The taste and texture of this is not good, undrinkable.
customer_reviews.author: lovefashion

customer_reviews.title: Organic A+, Sugar C-
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to find good great shakes without a lot of sugar. That said this one is good and it had a lot of protein. The flavor is good too even for those that are not protein shake fans. I would recommend this over the overly processed protein shakes and powders out there.
customer_reviews.author: IShopAlotonAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Best tasting protein shake by far
customer_reviews.text: Pro: better tasting than Allmax nutrition, muscle milk, premier protein, Ensure, optimum nutrition gold standard 100% whey, Russian Bear and more that I can't think of right now. Just know that I have tried soo many different protein powders and shakes and this organic valley protein shake is by far the best tasting one of them all. Cons: price is a little high
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good after workout or for breakfast
customer_reviews.text: My husband will use these as a breakfast replacement when he's running out the door or drink one right after a long run/ride/swim/etc. He says they are tasty, and I love that they are from organic valley. With subscribe and size, they are also significantly cheaper than buying them at the store, which is a big plus.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: These are great! My son is underweight so I give these ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great! My son is underweight so I give these to him to sneak more protein and calories into his diet. He loves it and I feel good about giving it to him because it doesn't have nearly the chemicals and other junk that some protein drinks do.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Mom of 2

customer_reviews.title: They changed the whole product. Doesn't taste good anymore.
customer_reviews.text: They changed the whole product. Replaced organic sugar with Stevie to get calories down. Increased prices and get less ounces per bottle. Tastes like crap now. Old version tasted like melted chocolate ice cream. No it taste like all the other crappy protein shake bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Hello99

customer_reviews.title: Organic Valley Please Bring This Back
customer_reviews.text: Why Organic Valley changed their formula is crazy. At the very lease they should offer both the low sugar 20g and continue to produce the original 26g formula. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Organic Valley Please Bring This Back

customer_reviews.title: New Formulation is Disgusting
customer_reviews.text: The old product used to be my go to for my daily protein shake. The new one tastes horrible, has less protein, and now stevia as a sweetner. Very disappointed in Organic Valley.
customer_reviews.author: F A

customer_reviews.title: Organic valley fuel vanilla 11 fl.oz
customer_reviews.text: Organic valley fuel vanilla 11 fl oz. These taste great. My husband drinks the supplement dri ks. So I get them for him. And I try to explore. Trying to find a new one for him. This one is good.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Pittman

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great. I only drink one bottle either before or ...
customer_reviews.text: Tastes great. I only drink one bottle either before or after my workout. I am very happy with the product. I could drink these all day long!
customer_reviews.author: TexasDude

customer_reviews.title: Product expired too fast. Short shelf life
customer_reviews.text: Just realized that the product I purchased expired 30 days after the delivery date. Therefore, a majority of them will go in the garbage because we did not drink them fast enough as the shelf life is usually much longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Protein Shake
customer_reviews.text: I just started working out at a gym and my trainer suggested this product but it was hard to fine, I purchased it and absolutely love the fact it hasn't chemicals,the taste amount of protein is more than most products on the market.
customer_reviews.author: dancing lady

customer_reviews.title: Great Taste, But Kinda High in Carbs
customer_reviews.text: The headline says it all. I love the taste, but with the protein and carb levels almost identical, there are better options out there for protein shakes. But, for an all-around health drink not bad at all. I will be buying this again in the future as a "treat" to change up the routine.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Claassen

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: I wish this was Lactose Free! But since it isn’t, I must take Lactaid. But that doesn’t stop me from indulging in this delicious drink that gives me energy and satisfies my appetite. I get the chocolate drink. Not sure but there may be a vanilla. But the chocolate is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: cs

customer_reviews.title: Best tasting, but also most expensive protein drink I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: 4.5 stars - loosing .5 stars for price. This is the best-tasting protein drink I have ever had. I also love Chocolate Core Power and Chocolate Muscle Milk (RTD), but this Organic Valley Organic Fuel is the best - at least in taste. I would use it more if it weren't so expensive. I buy a single 4-pack every month with my subscribe and save, but use them up faster than that. I try to save them for post-workout only, but they are so good it is hard to avoid drinking them at other times.
customer_reviews.author: Glen Barratt

customer_reviews.title: Shake it before opening.
customer_reviews.text: My son and I both drink one of these ready-to-go shakes after our work-outs at the gym. They're sold at the gym too, but cost a lot more than what I paid on Amazon. The packaging was secure and all the bottles were intact. The stuff is so tasty, I'm tempted to drink it at other times during the day.
customer_reviews.author: Candace Cairo

customer_reviews.title: Make sure they are fresh
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my wife, normally the shakes taste good, but the last order the vanilla did not taste right even after shaking it up it was chunky and tasted old. Called the actual company they said to contact Amazon. So here goes the run around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BRING BACK THE OLD PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I echo many of the reviews that can't stand the new product. The old formula was my favorite protein drink on the market and they went and ruined it.
customer_reviews.author: Alanna Barton

customer_reviews.title: Great protein shake
customer_reviews.text: I like this and need a protein supplement, but I like the Core Power product of a similar amount of protein better. It seems Fuller somehow.
customer_reviews.author: w.l.

customer_reviews.title: My protein drink of choice!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE these protein drinks! Very good taste, better tasting than all other protein drinks. I love that is has organic sugar and not sucralose or stevia, please don't ever change that. Will continue to purchase this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High in Sugar, But Tastes Great!
customer_reviews.text: There is a reason these are often sold out. They taste great and while they are high in sugar I actually end up working out a bit harder to "earn" these as a recovery treat. My wife loves these for her breakfast alongside a coffee. They also don't upset our stomachs like some other protein drinks. Have been using them for a couple of years and no issues so far. Wegmans is our other option for buying these when Amazon is out of stock.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Tasty but way too expensive
customer_reviews.text: This was one is the best protein shakes ever. My daughter and I loved it. Great for folks like us who can't wolf down a full breakfast within an hour of waking. Yummy chocolate taste and organic, two pros for purchase. Unfortunate con - the price. Way too high.
customer_reviews.author: Jameelah

customer_reviews.title: Excellent source of protein
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a protein supplement for my son. He's a picky eater and has tried many protein supplements that he didn't like. He loves these. It has a delicious, rich chocolatey taste. He drinks these as a snack or with his breakfast. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is because it's a bit pricey. Although, it's cheaper on Amazon than in my local grocery store.
customer_reviews.author: Carol ArscottTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Good breakfast for picky teen
customer_reviews.text: My teenage son is an incredibly picky eater. I give him one of these each morning to ensure he gets protein to start his day. Yummy.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy S.

customer_reviews.title: Delicious, high protein,, high quality shake.
customer_reviews.text: I find this convenient milkshake to be delicious. I just love the flavor...the texture...everything about it. I try to limit myself to one per day, but sometimes I slip and enjoy two :-)
customer_reviews.author: Dave Reid

customer_reviews.title: No longer available(?)
customer_reviews.text: I love the product but its no longer available(?) It would also be better if it had less sugar...and it’s pretty pricey.
customer_reviews.author: hikerjoe

customer_reviews.title: Grat product!  Packaging, not so much!
customer_reviews.text: Organic Fuel is perfect for me after a vigorous workout! Love this stuff! It's a bit on the expensive side so I don't order as often as I would like. This is the way it came packaged from Amazon. Grateful that the bottles are well sealed.
customer_reviews.author: CJM

customer_reviews.title: Okay for a month
customer_reviews.text: My son used these for a month and loved it but then it started to give him stomach pain. So we had to stop using them and then he was back to normal. But it could be from him being lactose intolerant.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Fraschetti

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Worked for us as an alternative to pediasure.. organic, but also, and most importantly, "acceptable" to the palate of a very picky three year old.. I mix it half and half with whole milk and he will happily drink it. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: RainCityMama

customer_reviews.title: Tasty but high in sugar
customer_reviews.text: I like the taste of it a lot, and it's wonderfully straightforward ingredients list. However, it's also quite high in sugar, which means I still fee a crash an hour later.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Bath

customer_reviews.title: Great taste, less sweet.
customer_reviews.text: Many protein drinks are very sweet. Organic Valley has more protein and less sugar than most. And it tastes great.
customer_reviews.author: inxs4

customer_reviews.title: Real cool fuel
customer_reviews.text: I love this cold. Sometimes I add Ovaltine Chocolate Malt to it and shake it up for extra vitamins. It's a meal and doesn't upset my stomach. I don't mind the price. I have bought before and will buy again. I love that it is organic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My Fav
customer_reviews.text: By far some of the best Protein shakes I've ever had. Can't get enough. I used them for a liquid diet and I love the flavor and that it's all organic. I'm not big on the fake stuff. I hope this helps. It really doesn't taste like any other shake and I've tried many.
customer_reviews.author: zachus

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I love it, I need it... can’t always afford it!
customer_reviews.author: jodi kutz

customer_reviews.title: excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I have diabetic type 2 this product high in protein have been helped to have a good reading. in the morning. my diner is the shake. very excellent product. proteins is very good for high blood sugar. always check the sugar level to be safe.
customer_reviews.author: mercy

customer_reviews.title: Organic Valley High Protein Fuel is a Real Treat!
customer_reviews.text: Love the flavor, consistency and protein content. Organic Valley has never disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Fred C Quimby

customer_reviews.title: A good hi protein drink
customer_reviews.text: Wish the price was lower, but it is my husband ‘s favorite so far, so worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: KeukaNana

customer_reviews.title: Taste like the boxed vanilla milks for kids they sell at ...
customer_reviews.text: Taste like the boxed vanilla milks for kids they sell at Costco! I believe the brand is Horizon organic! And my very picky oldest 10 year old son likes it!! We will be buying again and again and again!!
customer_reviews.author: LucKyMe

customer_reviews.title: Quality Protein Shakes
customer_reviews.text: These are delicious and 7-points per shake on Weight Watchers. I don,t have time for a big breakfast in the morning so these work out great for me.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Great taste great product
customer_reviews.text: I have severe morning sickness and sometimes these are all I can get down. They taste great and get some protein in the belly!
customer_reviews.author: Christina P

customer_reviews.title: The best pick-me-up after a workout!
customer_reviews.text: Not only does it taste great but it gives you the energy you need after a workout whether you're hiking (I'm in Arizona) or just doing your daily workout. I definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Ragsdale

customer_reviews.title: Only wish it were cheaper!!
customer_reviews.text: Delicious protien shake! Tastes like a rich and creamy milkshake but it's packed w protein. Love the vanilla flavor. I wanted to drink all of them at once haha. The only complaint I have is I wish they were cheaper. And I wish they sold them at stores near me in the middle of no where Missouri. I am glad they ship them to me though.
customer_reviews.author: CMaMa

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: It tasted like chocolate milk. It is the best tasting protein drink I've tried so far. I'll try to find a cheaper local source if available.
customer_reviews.author: Janice from Amherst

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great. I'm not usually a vanilla fan but this ...
customer_reviews.text: Tastes great. I'm not usually a vanilla fan but this stuff is very good. Creamy, no weird aftertaste. We switched to Organic Fuel after Core Power changed their formula and we are very pleased with it. The chocolate flavor is also excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Paulie Sauce

customer_reviews.title: Great Tasting High Protein Shake
customer_reviews.text: Very high in protein and calories. This is the best tasting shake for my so, who is trying to gain weight. It is a little pricey, but I have not been able to find a shake with as much protein that tastes this good.
customer_reviews.author: Furbina1

customer_reviews.title: They’ve ruined something great.
customer_reviews.text: Other reviewers have noted this, but the new formulation is awful - it’s basically the Coke II flop of milk protein shakes. Some product manager really screwed up on this one. Taste and protein benefits have been terribly degraded. BRING BACK THE OLD VERSION!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Flynn

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting
customer_reviews.text: Son loves this stuff. We have tried others that he will not drink. He says this one tastes great.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: He happily drinks it after long practices
customer_reviews.text: My son needed something to boost protein after swim workouts due to weight loss. He dislikes most available protein powders. He loves this drink. He happily drinks it after long practices.
customer_reviews.author: S. Olbrich

customer_reviews.title: This is a great beverage to give him a little extra density in ...
customer_reviews.text: My son is a very picky eater. This is a great beverage to give him a little extra density in his meal.
customer_reviews.author: A. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Great nutritional drink
customer_reviews.text: I like the flavor, I drink an hour before exercise and sometimes a supplement for breakfast.
customer_reviews.author: nitahummer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and filling!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the taste and they are very filling. They are very high in protein and the ingredients are great!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Not all protein shakes are the same, this one is delicious and super healthy, what a concept!
customer_reviews.text: Delicious, filling, good for you. I love these so much I keep a couple in fridge and pantry at all times. Chocolate and Vanilla are amazing. Most protein shakes taste like powders, odd ingredients, etc. but these do not. Everyone I have had taste this loves it, including kids. This is unique because it's all organic and has double the protein of a lot of shakes. Worth the money and a shot at trying. YUMMMO
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: WAY too sweet
customer_reviews.text: Just tasted like chocolate milk, not a protein shake. I like protein shakes w less sugar.
customer_reviews.author: Juli

customer_reviews.title: Great taste and great product!
customer_reviews.text: I drink this almost every day. Was very disappointed when I could not get it and tried the newer version with only 20 grams of protein. The taste is great!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good price and keep unrefrigurated for several months or until ...
customer_reviews.text: Good price and keep unrefrigurated for several months or until the expiration date. I often run low on protein, so this chocolate milk is a good way for me to get the extra protein I need.
customer_reviews.author: ConnieLB

customer_reviews.title: Fuel to start your day!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shakes. A little expensive but the protein content is very high. Great taste.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bertone

customer_reviews.title: This tastes super good. Love the fact that it has no ...
customer_reviews.text: This tastes super good. Love the fact that it has no aspartame or acesulfame or the likes. Lists no carrageenan too just plain cane sugar for sweetening. 240 odd calories is reasonable as for folks building muscle need calories anyways and folks losing wt also need some calories and this is not bad at all
customer_reviews.author: Elijah

customer_reviews.title: Great product. I received a great price and now ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I received a great price and now it has gone up 6x higher!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's very sweet!
customer_reviews.text: If I could change it I would cut way back on the sugar. It's too sweet!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. It tastes great and works well after a bike ride or gym workout.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for on the go when you need a quick drink to fuel your morning or before activities!
customer_reviews.text: Great taste and useful for when on the go! Settles well because Skim Milk is used vs. Whole. Chocolate is definitely my favorite. Great for a quick shake before any activity. I usually grab one before dance practice or hitting the gym.. but early mornings before work helps too! makes a decent breakfast replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel

customer_reviews.title: Totally love it!  Just because.
customer_reviews.text: Delicious! absolutely! and is perfect for my daily protein boost! I add pineapple, etc. in the blender & WOW! it is just really perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Timbuktu

customer_reviews.title: Handy, delish, but high in sugar.
customer_reviews.text: This is great when I on the run w no time to make my own healthy shake. Creamy and very chocolatey w 26 grams is protein. Nice to grab n go! I only gave 4 stars because it had a high level of sugar, 26 grams , should not be a 1-1 ratio to protein, I wish they would make a version w less sugar.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Rose McDonald

customer_reviews.title: great quality product
customer_reviews.text: love this stuff as a meal replacement, great flavor and quality of the product. love the other flavors to!
customer_reviews.author: tomasa

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: I love these in my AM coffee as they provide a nice boost of protein and are not overly sweet or have that weird unnatural sweet taste.
customer_reviews.author: Amir NC

product_meta.title: Organic Valley Fuel Chocolate 11 Fl Oz (Pack of 12)
product_meta.description: Flavor:OLD Chocolate| Size:Pack of 12Jumpstart your workout recovery with the 26 grams of organic milk protein in Organic Fuel. Organic Fuel has an ideal 1:1 ratio of protein to carbs to replenish your body with the nutrients it needs to maximize recovery while building and repairing muscle. Organic Fuel gets its protein straight from the source - the naturally occurring casein and whey found in real, organic milk. We never add chalky protein powders so you can count on a creamy, smooth protein shake every time. Organic Fuel organic milk protein shakes are made with organic and fair-trade ingredients. You can recover easy knowing you're getting everything you need and nothing you don't. Organic Fuel is ready-to-drink and available in Chocolate and Vanilla. This milk is UHT processed for longer shelf life and can be stored unrefrigerated. For best taste serve cold.
